name: Solar System (itch) (lonniece3@yahoo.com)
description:
This is my Solar System project:

+ Mercury

+Pluto

+Mars

+Jupiter

+Neptune

Each added planet has sound and a rotation script just as the Earth, Moon, and Sun!

I have also switched the mini map from the bottom left to top left while also making the background black for visual purposes. 

Added a new Skybox "Fire Galaxy" and in doing so I've also made modifications to the lighting emitting from the Sun and a soft shadow from the  moon to Earth.

Enjoy! :}

  By: Lonnie Edwards
